name: JellyBean's MID-SIM Demo
description:
After 3 days of development, internal contempt, and mental anguish due to me having to listen to JellyBean for more than 2 seconds /j, 
I present the Mid-Sim (Mid-Simulator) demo!
A 1K rhythm game made in Kaboom.

P.S. Any hate messages or content in the game is purely just cosmetic/for fun. Don't let the low-resolution skeletons get to you, please!

P.S.S. JellyBean is not that mid tbh.

Included Asset Credit: Getting it Done (used) by Kevin MacLeod Mecha-Tribe Assault by Kommisar Default Note Click from osu! by PPY RedVelvety Note Click from Quaver Mark Note Click is Burp from Kaboom.JS created by Replit.com devs

JellyBean character referenced from tintaferris' drawing and created by BeanNotHere

RedVelvety character created by RedVelvetyLIVE

Mark character referenced from Kaboom.JS created by Replit.com devs

CarterRedacted character created by emptynarration for CarterRedacted
